events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer issue was classified under the refund category based on keywords like refund and request.
Assigned the case to refund support team for further assistance and processing of the refund request.
Hello, I’m sorry to hear you got the wrong item. I’m here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received? This will help us verify your refund.
Sure, my order number is 123456789 and attached is a photo of the incorrect item I got instead of the one I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund immediately and you can expect the money back within 5 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and refund processing. I appreciate your help resolving this issue so fast.
The refund has been successfully processed on our end. Please check your bank account in a few days.
Just following up to ensure you have received the refund and that everything is now satisfactory with your order.
Since the refund was confirmed received and no further issues were reported, we are closing this support case.
